skillTree.localised_description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Loyal, fierce, powerful and surprisingly fast – a War Bear is a symbol of Kislev itself.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Naught can penetrate the swirling mists of ice and sleet that churn around those afforded Father Bear's protection.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Surviving wounds that would have killed lesser men, it is clear that this one bears the favour of the Kislevite gods.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%

skillTree.localised_description: The Patriarch speaks with the voice of the gods, spreading the spirit of Kislev far and wide.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cooldown: -25% to "Dazh's Song of Winter Sunlight"

skillTree.localised_description: This one's stentorian roar ensures that his blood-and-thunder missives always reach their intended recipients.

effects.description: Damage Building action: Additional 5% damage caused

skillTree.localised_description: "An animal so vicious, no others fought and won. So on the fields of battle, we are the chosen ones!"

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 4% chance of wounding target

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

skillTree.localised_description: Rest is for the weak; one must harry the enemy in relentless pursuit and leave them no time to regroup.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Frail as they may seem, there is no doubt the Gods guide the Patriarch's arm, and lend him their strength in defence of the Motherland.
There is nothing but utter belief. There is no reasoning with this one.
"Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"
Such is this one's conviction that others have no choice but to believe.
Speaking words of power or faith can alter perceptions on the battlefield.
Kostaltyn’s flat metal discs, inscribed with Ursun’s runes and icons, inspire even greater deeds when awarded to the worthy.
This one will not go down easily - it will be necessary to break both the will and the body first.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Never to be broken or dishonoured - never to succumb to the foe.
This one fights with a fervour to be both admired and despised.
The longer you believe, the more intense that faith becomes. When your belief is total, there is nothing that you cannot achieve.
"Death is like a winter chill; No door can keep it from us; And summer yet may bloom againThough ice be all upon us."

effects.description: Cooldown: -25% to "Dazh's Song of Winter Sunlight"

skillTree.localised_description: Take it all!
Kossars are true sons of Kislev. Children of Ursun.

effects.description:
Leadership: +1 for Kossars, Kossovite Dervishes and Horse Archers units
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +2 for Kossars, Kossovite Dervishes and Horse Archers units
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +4 for Kossars, Kossovite Dervishes and Horse Archers units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.
My lord, I believe I’ve found something of interest...

effects.description:
Magic item drop chance: +5%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +10%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +20%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: We all must fight, no matter our station.
I’ve managed to procure some additional supplies for the troops, my lord.

effects.description:
Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -7% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: True experience is born only on the battlefield.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -2% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Vigour loss reduction: -4% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Vigour loss reduction: -8% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: It is not just the forces of Chaos that can despoil, break and ruin.

effects.description: Damage Building action: Additional 5% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 15% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.
Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!
Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

Ambush defence chance: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Well built, robust. Powerful.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
Some men are natural leaders, born to foster and marshal their tribes through devastating wars and the harshest of winters.

effects.description:
Leadership: +2 when in own territory
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: For those used to life in the oblasts, keeping the elements out is only the beginning of the measures they must take to ensure the survival of their people.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +2 when in own territory
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This valorous warrior has been at the forefront of the struggle against Ruin before, and they certainly shall be again, steeled and girded by that dreadful experience.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

effects.description:
Leadership: +4 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: By right of his storied experience, this one is trusted to make sound judgements in the best interests of the Motherland.
Kossars are blood of Kislev.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -2% for Kossars units
	(all units in army)

Melee defence: +2 for Kossars units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The famous Winged Lancers of Kislev are mostly made up of young sons of Boyars from all across the lands.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +10% for Kossovite Dervishes, Winged Lancers and Gryphon Legion units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Know your place!
Test for true men!
Know your enemy, know yourself.
